items.name: Kouign-Amann
items.description: French-Breton laminated butter pastry with a caramelized crust. All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Butter, Sugar, Salt, Yeast

items.name: Palmiers
items.description: French laminated puff pastry cookie. All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Unsalted Butter, Demerara Sugar, Eggs, Sugar, Kosher Salt, Ground Cinnamon

items.name: Tarte Tatin
items.description: French upside-down caramelized apple tart on flaky butter pastry. Apples, All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Unsalted Butter, Sugar, Apple Cider Vinegar, Apple Brandy, Vanilla Extract, Kosher Salt

items.name: Linzertorte
items.description: Austrian nut tart with fruit jam filling, selection varies. Sugar, Unsalted Butter, Fruit (Blackberries, Raspberries, Blueberries, or Strawberries), All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Pistachios (or Hazelnuts, Almonds, Pecans, Walnuts), Eggs, Lemon Juice, Vanilla Extract, Lemon Zest, Ground Cinnamon, Kosher Salt

items.name: Focaccia
items.description: Italian olive oil bread topped with olives, rosemary, and sea salt. All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Extra-Virgin Olive Oil, Butter, Castelvetrano Olives (Castelvetrano Olives, Water, Sea Salt, Lactic Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Citric Acid), Kalamata Olives (Kalamata Olives, Water, Sea Salt, Red Wine Vinegar, Lactic Acid, Extra Virgin Olive Oil), Rosemary, Garlic, Honey, Kosher Salt, Active Dry Yeast, Sea Salt

items.name: French-Style Baguette
items.description: French bread with medium crumb & crackly crust. Bread Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour), Milk Whey, Salt, Yeast

items.name: Soft Pretzel
items.description: German-American soft pretzel stick. All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Unsalted Butter, Yeast, Brown Sugar, Salt, Sodium Carbonate

items.name: Thrice-Baked Rye Shortbread
items.description: Crisp rye-forward shortbread. Unsalted Butter, Granulated Sugar, All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Rye Flour, Eggs, Vanilla Extract, Demerara Sugar, Kosher Salt, Baking Powder

items.name: Pecan Brittle Oat Cookies
items.description: Lacy oat cookies with pecan brittle. Unsalted Butter, Granulated Sugar, Rolled Oats, All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Brown Sugar, Pecans, Eggs, Vanilla Extract, Baking Soda, Kosher Salt

items.name: Molasses Spice Cookies
items.description: Chewy molasses cookies, highlighting the flavor of ground long pepper, also known as the pipalli fruit. All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Dark Brown Sugar, Butter, Molasses, Eggs, Demerara Sugar, Baking Soda, Apple Cider Vinegar, Vanilla Extract, Ground Ginger, Kosher Salt, Ground Long Pepper, Ground Allspice, Ground Cloves

items.name: Almond Cookies
items.description: Crumbly almond shortbread cookies. Unsalted Butter, Sugar, All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Almond Flour, Eggs, Almond Extract, Baking Soda, Kosher Salt

items.name: Rosh Hashanah Cake
items.description: Celebratory honey-rye loaf cake, sold by the slice. All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Honey, Applesauce (Apples, Water, Ascorbic Acid), Eggs, Sugar, Rye Flour, Baking Powder, Ground Cinnamon, Kosher Salt, Ground Allspice, Ground Nutmeg, Lemon Zest, Ground Cloves, Vegetable Oil

items.name: Kabocha Tea Cake
items.description: Spiced loaf cake with kabocha squash and pumpkin seeds, sold by the slice. Kabocha Squash, All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Sugar, Virgin Coconut Oil, Eggs, Pumpkin Seeds, Maple Syrup, Baking Powder, Vanilla Extract, Ground Turmeric, Kosher Salt, Garam Masala (Cumin, Black Pepper, Cinnamon, Cloves, Coriander, Cardamom)

items.name: Coffee-Coffee Cake
items.description: Coffee-flavored crumb cake with coffee ribbon and streusel topping, sold by the slice. All-Purpose Flour (Unbleached Hard Red Wheat Flour, Enzyme or Malted Barley Flour), Brown Sugar, Butter, Granulated Sugar, Eggs, Sour Cream, Brewed Coffee, Vegetable Oil, Instant Coffee Granules, Vanilla Extract, Baking Powder, Kosher Salt, Ground Cinnamon, Baking Soda, Ground Cardamom
